com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.widget

クラス WidgetExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.widget.WidgetExtension
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    NotificationWidgetExtension

    public abstract class WidgetExtension
extends java.lang.Object
    The widget extension handles a widget on an accessory.

    • フィールドの概要

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • WidgetExtension

        public WidgetExtension(Context context,
               java.lang.String hostAppPackageName)
        Create widget extension.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context.
        hostAppPackageName - Package name of host application.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • startRefresh

        public final void startRefresh()
        Start widget refresh.

      • stopRefresh

        public final void stopRefresh()
        Stop widget refresh.

      • destroy

        public final void destroy()
        Destroy widget.

      • onStartRefresh

        public abstract void onStartRefresh()
        Start refreshing the widget. The widget is now visible.

      • onStopRefresh

        public abstract void onStopRefresh()
        Stop refreshing the widget. The widget is no longer visible.

      • onScheduledRefresh

        public void onScheduledRefresh()
        Override this method to take action on scheduled refresh. Example of how to schedule a refresh every 10th second in onStartRefresh() and cancel it in onStopRefresh() 
         public void startRefresh() {
     // Update now and every 10th second
     scheduleRepeatingRefresh(System.currentTimeMillis(), 10 * 1000,
             SampleWidgetService.EXTENSION_KEY);
 }

 public void stopRefresh() {
     cancelScheduledRefresh(SampleWidgetService.EXTENSION_KEY);
 }

 public void onScheduledRefresh() {
     // Update widget...
 }
        関連項目:
        scheduleRefresh(long, String), scheduleRepeatingRefresh(long, long, String), cancelScheduledRefresh(String)

      • scheduleRepeatingRefresh

        protected void scheduleRepeatingRefresh(long triggerAtTime,
                            long interval,
                            java.lang.String extensionKey)
        Schedule a repeating refresh.
        パラメータ:
        triggerAtTime - Time the scheduled refresh should trigger first time in System.currentTimeMillis() time.
        interval - Interval between subsequent repeats of the scheduled refresh.
        extensionKey - The extension key
        関連項目:
        onScheduledRefresh(), scheduleRefresh(long, String), cancelScheduledRefresh(String)

      • scheduleRefresh

        protected void scheduleRefresh(long triggerAtTime,
                   java.lang.String extensionKey)
        Schedule a refresh.
        パラメータ:
        triggerAtTime - Time the scheduled refresh should trigger in System.currentTimeMillis() time.
        extensionKey - The extension key

      • cancelScheduledRefresh

        protected void cancelScheduledRefresh(java.lang.String extensionKey)
        Cancel any pending scheduled refresh associated with the extension key.
        パラメータ:
        extensionKey - The extension key

      • onDoAction

        public void onDoAction(int requestCode,
              Bundle bundle)
        Take action based on request code
        パラメータ:
        requestCode - Code used to distinguish between different actions.
        bundle - Optional bundle with additional information.
        関連項目:
        WidgetReceiver#doActionOnAllWidgets(int)

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Called to notify a widget extension that it is no longer used and is being removed. The widget extension should clean up any resources it holds (threads, registered receivers, etc) at this point.

      • onTouch

        public void onTouch(int type,
           int x,
           int y)
        The widget has been touched. Override to handle touch events.
        パラメータ:
        type - The type of touch event.
        x - The x position of the touch event.
        y - The y position of the touch event.

      • sendImageToHostApp

        protected void sendImageToHostApp(int resourceId)
        Sends an image to the host application.
        パラメータ:
        resourceId - The image resource id.

      • sendToHostApp

        protected void sendToHostApp(Intent intent)
        Send intent to host application. Adds host application package name and our package name.
        パラメータ:
        intent - The intent to send.

      • showBitmap

        protected void showBitmap(Bitmap bitmap)
        Show bitmap on accessory.
        パラメータ:
        bitmap - The bitmap to show.
